widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

config.title: Alejandro Mejia
config.description: Hello team! My name is Alejandro Mejia. I am from San Luis Potos√≠. I am 22 years old and a self-taught person passionate about the IT world. I like to exercise at the gym and play musical instruments in my free time. I am willing to turn my dreams into goals and will not stop until I see them come true. I love learning new things daily and sharing my knowledge with others.
